Name: BoyandBox
About the game: Boyandbox is a skill based puzzle platformer where you use a teleporting box to solve problems. The box can be used both as a platform for you to jump off of, as well as a shield to protect you from enemies. The game requires skill and precision. However, most of the levels have multiple solutions and the game always lets you take a step back to figure out the most optimal path. Features Over 50 unique and challenging levels. 6 different areas, each with their own soundtrack. Blue blobs. Red blobs. A boy. A box.
